name: Hentai Casual Jigsaw - Witches
description:
Hentai Casual Jigsaw - Witches is a relaxing game where you have to solve different jigsaw puzzles with images of beautiful witches!

Features:


- Relax yourself with gorgeous illustrations created exclusively for the game.

- Beautiful relaxing soundtrack.

- Nice sound effects!

- Wonderful image gallery for your enjoyment. It's open, no need to unlock it!

- Enjoy 40 different illustrations!

- With 90 Achievements to unlock!
